title: Monica, O My Darling
writer: Vasan Bala, Yogesh Chandekar, Keigo Higashino
short_cast: Rajkummar Rao, Huma Qureshi, Radhika Apte, Akansha Ranjan Kapoor, Sikander Kher, Bagavathi Perumal, Sukant Goel, Zayn Marie Khan
cast: Rajkummar Rao, Huma Qureshi, Radhika Apte, Akansha Ranjan Kapoor, Sikander Kher, Bagavathi Perumal, Sukant Goel, Zayn Marie Khan
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Movies Based on Books, Bollywood Movies, Crime Movies, Comedies, Dramas, Thriller Movies

desc: A slick robotics expert joins a murderous plot after a passionate affair takes a sudden turn, but nothing — not even death — is what it seems to be.
